text: Lycée Léonard de Vinci is a senior high school/sixth form college in Levallois-Perret, Hauts-de-Seine, France, in the Paris metropolitan area. it has 1,744 students. () ==History== It was formed in 1990 by a merger with a technical high school and a professional high school. Its current building, then newly constructed, opened on November 22, 1993."Historique." Lycée Léonard de Vinci (Levallois-Perret). Retrieved on July 27, 2016. In April 2016 the campus experienced arson that destroyed the school's lobby. () Damages were estimated to be €150,000. A student was convicted of causing the riot that resulted in the arson. ==References== ==External links== * Lycée Léonard de Vinci Category:Lycées in Hauts-de-Seine
title: Lycée Léonard de Vinci (Levallois-Perret)
